item.name: block_title_to_short
item.message: The name of the block should be at least 3 characters long

item.name: dynamic_page_hints
item.message: Please use the format "module/file/optional_parameters/", to link to a ACP3 internal page, e.g. news/details/id_1/.

item.name: index_name_description
item.message: This describes the name of the Templateplaceholder

item.name: index_name_unique
item.message: The name of the template placeholder has to be unique

item.name: mod_description
item.message: This module is responsible for the navbars.

item.name: select_block
item.message: Please select, in which navigation bar you want to display the page

item.name: select_item_visibility
item.message: Please select, wether you want to display to menu item or not

item.name: select_page_type
item.message: Please select, of which type the page should be

item.name: superior_page_not_allowed
item.message: It is impossible to use the selected page as a superior page

item.name: title_to_short
item.message: The title should be at least 3 characters long

item.name: type_in_index_name
item.message: The index name can only contain letters, digits and the underscore

item.name: type_in_uri_and_target
item.message: Please type in the target page and the module, resp. the URI you whish to link to
